sourcesContent:
// doc: https://nhnent.github.io/tui.editor/api/latest/ToastUIEditor.html#ToastUIEditor
export default {
  minHeight: '360px',
  previewStyle: 'vertical',
  useCommandShortcut: true,
  useDefaultHTMLSanitizer: true,
  usageStatistics: false,
  hideModeSwitch: true,
  toolbarItems: [
    'heading',
    'bold',
    'italic',
    'strike',
    'divider',
    'hr',
    'quote',
    'divider',
    'ul',
    'ol',
    'indent',
    'outdent',
    'divider',
    'table',
    'image',
    'link',
    'divider',
    'code',
    'codeblock'
  ]
}
